name: bitwarden
title: Bitwarden Vault
description: Access a Bitwarden account. Requires installing the Bitwarden CLI.
author: pomdtr

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search Vault
commands.subtitle: Bitwarden
commands.description: Search all items in the authenticated Bitwarden vault.

preferences.name: primaryAction
preferences.description: The primary action to perform on a vault item.
preferences.title: Primary Action

preferences.name: clientId
preferences.title: Client ID
preferences.description: The client_id value seen in the My Account section of a Bitwarden web vault. More info: https://bitwarden.com/help/article/personal-api-key/

preferences.name: clientSecret
preferences.title: Client Secret
preferences.description:
The client_secret value seen in the My Account section of a Bitwarden web vault.
More info: https://bitwarden.com/help/article/personal-api-key/

preferences.name: cliPath
preferences.title: Bitwarden CLI Installation Path
preferences.description: Location of the local Bitwarden CLI installation. Defaults to '/usr/local/bin/bw' on Intel and '/opt/homebrew/bin/bw' on M1.

preferences.name: fetchFavicons
preferences.title: Privacy
preferences.label: Fetch Vault Items Icons
preferences.description: Whether to use a Google-owned service to fetch icons for vault items. If left unchecked, built-in icons will be used.
